G

g - Variable in class model.Game
The Graphics the game will draw to
Game - Class in model
The class responsible for running the entire game

Constructs a new Game with the given title, width, and height
gameBackground - Static variable in class assets.Assets
 
GameBackground() - Constructor for class assets.Assets.GameBackground
 
gameState - Static variable in class model.Game
The state for the game part of the game
GameState - Class in state
The State of the game that handles the actual game
GameState(Canvas) - Constructor for class state.GameState
 
GameState.BreakIndicator - Class in state
Informs the user of the status of the current tile to be broken Displays a little wheel at the mouse cursor that fills.
GameState.Hotbar - Class in state
A class for the hotbar which stores Items that the user can place.
GameState.Hotbar.Selection - Class in state
Indicates which slot of the Hotbar is selected
GameState.InventorySlot - Class in state
A class for holding one or many Items in the Hotbar
GameState.PlaceIndicator - Class in state
Shows an Item texture at the cursor's position which indicates the item that will be placed
GameState.WarFog - Class in state
Indicates which parts of the screen cannot be edited due to the tower
